DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer recruit . All subject test battery neuropsychological test , undergo fluorodeoxyglucose-positron emission tomography ( PET ) magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) . During PET MRI , stimulate transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) 15 minute . Half subject receive real tDCS half receive sham tDCS .
DOC.brief_title: Normal Brain Imaging Database Brain Disorder Studies
DOC.criteria: History neurological psychiatric disease ; Abnormal MRI ; metal implant cardiac pacemaker ; Pregnant breastfeed woman ( female subject child bear potential screened pregnancy MRI imaging ) . severe hypertension . cardiovascular disease . Family history epilepsy .
